greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = p-1 if n=p, p if n=p^e and e<>1, 1 otherwise; p a prime.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(n) = Product_{d divides n} phi(n/d)^mu(d). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Mar 08 2004
a(n) = A217863(n)/A217863(n-1) for n > 1. - _Eric Desbiaux_, Nov 23 2012; corrected by _Thomas Ordowski_, Aug 25 2015
D.g.f.: zeta(s) + Sum_{p prime} (p-2+p^(-s))/(p^s-1), - _Robert Israel_, Aug 25 2015
mathematica: Table[Which[PrimeQ@ n, n - 1, ! PrimeQ@ n && PrimePowerQ@ n,
First @@ FactorInteger@ n, True, 1], {n, 88}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Aug 25 2015 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = pp = isprimepower(n, &p); if (pp==1, n-1, if (pp, p, 1)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Aug 25 2015
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jul 03 2002
